channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- StatCounter – Free Real Time Visitor Stats
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- StatCounter – Free Real Time Visitor Stats

item.title: CVE-2021-24920|2024-08-03T19:49:14.031Z -- unknown -- statcounter%20%E2%80%93%20free%20real%20time%20visitor%20stats
item.description: The StatCounter WordPress plugin before 2.0.7 does not sanitise and escape the Project ID and Secure Code settings, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
